7.eng-name: The Book of the Adhan (The Call to Prayer)

hadiths.text: It was narrated from Nafi' that Ibn 'Umar gave a call to prayer on a cold and windy night, and he said:"Pray where you are, for the Prophet (S.A.W)used to order the Mu'adhdhin, if it was a cold and rainy night, to say: 'Pray in your dwellings

chapter.ara-name: باب الأَذَانِ فِي التَّخَلُّفِ عَنْ شُهُودِ الْجَمَاعَةِ، فِي اللَّيْلَةِ الْمَطِيرَةِ
chapter.eng-name: The Adhan Telling People Not To Come To Prayer in Congregation On A Rainy Night
